		</span>
		<md-button aria-label="btnfilteropen" can-be-moved=true flex=none class="md-icon-button md-squared md-raised" style="    " ng-click="showSearch = !showSearch"  id='ci184888' aria-label="btnfilteropen" dib-container-name='pluginGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
			<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
				Display headers for filtering records

							</div>

						</div>
					</ng-form>

					<ng-form name='pluginGrid' dib-container-name="pluginGrid" isolate-form layout="row" flex="100" dib-inline-edit="closed" layout-align="start start" ng-enter='saveRow($event,row)' >

		</md-content>
		<div layout-fill layout='row' flex class='dib-grid-footer'>
			<div flex=20 layout='row'>
				<md-button disabled>
					Page limit
				</md-button>
				<md-select ng-model="page.limit">
					<md-option ng-value="10">
						10
					</md-option>
					<md-option ng-value="20">
						20
					</md-option>
					<md-option ng-value="50">
						50
					</md-option>
				</md-select>
			</div>
			<div  ng-if="page.count>
				1" flex=80 layout='row'  layout-align="center center" >
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='firstPage()'>
					First 
				</md-button>
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='previousPage()'>
					Prev 
				</md-button>
				<div layout='row'>
					<md-button disabled>
						Page
					</md-button>
					<md-input-container>
						<input type='number' ng-model="page.number" aria-label="Page number">
					</md-input-container>
					<md-button disabled>
						of {{ page.count }} 
					</md-button>
				</div>
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='nextPage()'>
					Next 
				</md-button>
				<md-button  ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='lastPage()'>
					Last 
				</md-button>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
